Class BoardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoardGame

  • public class BoardGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates the board game with two players Player 1 is always human Player 2 can either be human or A.I

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      BoardGame()

    • Method Detail

      • generateRandomStartingCards

        public void generateRandomStartingCards()
        Generates 30 cards for each players to select their starting 10 cards

      • averagePartyAttack

        public int averagePartyAttack(int playerNumber,
                              java.lang.String attackType)
        Calculates and returns average party attack dealed for each party member ( = total damage / number of members)
        Parameters:
        playerNumber - Which player is attacking? (Player 1 or Player 2)
        attackType - Attack name (Wond? Kill? Bite? ...)
        Returns:
        verage party attack dealed for each party member = total damage / number of members

      • totalPartyAttack

        public int totalPartyAttack(int playerNumber,
                            java.lang.String attackType)
        Calculates and returns total damage dealt from war party
        Parameters:
        playerNumber - Which player is attacking? (Player 1 or Player 2)
        attackType - Attack name (Wond? Kill? Bite? ...)
        Returns:
        total damage dealt from war party

      • partyAttack

        public boolean partyAttack(int indexAttacked,
                           int playerNum,
                           java.lang.String attackType)
        Attacks other player's selected card with war party. War party can have 1 or more members
        Parameters:
        indexAttacked - Opponet's card which is under attack
        playerNum - Number of the player who is attacking
        attackType - War party attack type (Wond? Kill? Bite? ...)
        Returns:
        true: Every party member has enough SP for attack and party attacked successfully | false: not enough SP for attack

      • random2

        public int random2()
        Generates a random number (1 or 2) for A.I to decide to use which attack type (if selected animal has 2 attack types)
        Returns:
        1 or 2

      • checkFinish

        public boolean checkFinish()
        Controls if one player has won the game
        Returns:
        true: match is finished and one player has won the game! | false: match is not finished yet

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        Stops porcessing for 2 second. Player can observe his cards

        public Player getPlayer1()
